data.actual_result: There is no right padding. Text touches border of the code box.
data.expected_result: There is right padding similar to left padding.
data.short_description: No padding on the right side of the code block in Show Code in Rich Presence Visualizer
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the developer website. - Go to any application. - Go to Rich Presence. - Scroll down to see the Rich Presence Visualizer. - Click Show Code. - Scroll to the very right.
